Mercury::KeepAliveChannels

Mercury::KeepAliveChannels Class Reference

This class is used to keep track of channels that send and receive so infrequently that we need to send keepalive traffic to ensure the peer apps haven't died. More...

#include <keepalive_channels.hpp>

float defaultPeriod () const
 This method returns the interval for timeouts on this object.

Detailed Description

This class is used to keep track of channels that send and receive so infrequently that we need to send keepalive traffic to ensure the peer apps haven't died.
